snippet.title: 15 of nature's most spectacular shows
snippet.description:
* Fireworks are fantastic and human endeavor has its place, but sometimes Mother Nature outshines any performance we can produce.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/22/travel/nature-must-see-shows/index.html

snippet.title: Ted Turner: Time to finally protect wetlands, streams
snippet.description:
* Clean water is vital to every single American. Families should be able to turn on the tap and have safe drinking water for their children, vacationers expect healthy rivers for fishing and swimming, and businesses need a steady supply of clean water to make products.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/02/opinion/turner-wetlands-protection-epa/index.html

snippet.title: Carbon storage key to fighting global warming
snippet.description:
* The storage of carbon in agricultural lands, forests and grasslands can play an important role in fighting global warming in the 21st century, energy and agricultural officials concluded at a recent workshop in St. Michaels, Md.
http://www.cnn.com/TECH/science/9902/05/carbon.enn/index.html

snippet.title: Fires role in prairie survival stressed
snippet.description:
* ENN The smell of burning leaves has always been a sure sign of autumn. But springtime in the Kansas Flint Hills often confuses the olfactory senses because of the prescribed burning that takes place at the Konza Prairie Research Natural Area and area ranches.
http://www.cnn.com/TECH/science/9805/26/prarire/index.html

snippet.title: An amateur rancher brings the wastelands of the Southwest back to life
snippet.description:
* The land was parched and cracked and scattered with stones, as if the clouds had rained rocks in this part of the world. Small, thorny mesquites dotted the landscape, their taproots tunneling far beneath the soil to suck whatever water lay there. Creosote bushes fanned out from their mounds of chalky dirt and arroyos twisted this way and that, like...
http://www.cnn.com/2012/09/21/living/oprah-rancher/index.html

snippet.title: AsiaQuest
snippet.description:
* As we head east along Marco Polos route, the cities are getting bigger and more modern. Here in Zhangye, we see fewer farmers, donkey carts, and horses and more modern apartment buildings, hotels and lights. Compared to Kashgar, its like Las Vegas Everyone has electricity and at night the restaurants and storefronts are lit up like Christmas trees....
http://www.cnn.com/NATURE/9910/28/asia.quest/index.html

snippet.title: Invasive species threaten healthy ecosystems
snippet.description:
* Even healthy ecosystems are vulnerable to invasions by exotic species, according to scientists with the U.S. Geological Survey.
http://www.cnn.com/NATURE/9905/17/invasive.species.enn/index.html

snippet.title: Many bird populations in trouble, report says
snippet.description:
* Bird populations native to several areas of the globe are in decline, with some teetering on the brink of extinction, according to a multi-agency report, the first of its kind, released Thursday.
http://www.cnn.com/2009/TECH/science/03/19/endangered.birds.report/index.html

snippet.title: Biofuels: 'Green gold' or problems untold?
snippet.description:
* No subject appears to divide as many people in the climate change arena as biofuels. Their potential to positively impact greenhouse gas emissions is undoubtedly enormous.
http://www.cnn.com/2008/TECH/02/24/eco.biofuels/index.html

snippet.title: Warmer temperatures tied to wildfires, scientists say
snippet.description:
* Huge wildfires, such as the ones that have charred more than 460,000 acres this week in Southern California, are becoming more common in the Western United States, and scientists say warming trends and other climate factors may be responsible.
http://www.cnn.com/2007/TECH/science/10/25/env.environment.fires/index.html
